examples: That will teach them a lesson!

examples: She is playing with her favorite toy, a stuffed teddy bear.

words.defineEn: a toy that looks like a bear and is made of soft materials
words.defineVi: một món đồ chơi trông giống như một con gấu và được làm bằng vật liệu mềm

lose that creep!

words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ một đối tượng hoặc người cách xa một người

examples: The treatment has not yet been tried on patients.

examples: Why has the engine stopped?

examples: The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful

examples: Take an aspirin and lie down.

Even though they're cousins, aspirin does not have those same effects in the skin.

examples: The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.

Of course, there's method in her madness because an empty fridge means I have to take her out to dinner.

As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
words.defineEn: to get sick, usually with bacteria or a virus
words.defineVi: bị bệnh, thường là do vi khuẩn hoặc vi rút

words.defineEn: a room that people use in stores, gyms, schools, etc. to change or try on clothes

right on cue the door opened

examples: She spends her free time gardening as a hobby.

examples: A postcard showing the Wicklow Mountains.

If you have not, for a January promo, each pledge, even a dollar pledge, will get you a postcard with a little handwritten letter from me.

I did get one postcard back from Brittani Louise Taylor, if that's her name, and she said thank you.

examples: The recipe serves four people.
